name: SpooferPro
subtitle: iOS GPS Spoofer
description:
SpooferPro for PoGO is an enhanced edition of the PoGO app, adding a joystick and ability to teleport! It also includes a lot of other features like, IV Previews, Modified Throw, Auto Walking, GPX, Fast Catch, a live feed and even a map with everything around you! No need for a computer and even works on non-jailbreak iPhones! We highly recommend it, so check it out!

Join Discord at https://discord.gg/52HpPM4T2p

apps.name: Pokémon Go
apps.subtitle: SpooferPro - iOS GPS Spoofer
apps.localizedDescription: SpooferPro for PoGO is an enhanced edition of the PoGO app, adding a joystick and ability to teleport! It also includes a lot of other features like, IV Previews, Modified Throw, Auto Walking, GPX, Fast Catch, a live feed and even a map with everything around you! No need for a computer and even works on non-jailbreak iPhones! We highly recommend it, so check it out!

versions.localizedDescription:
- Fixed Avatar in Low Power Mode.
- Fixed False Rocket Limit Warning.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Allows pairing to devices including peripherals and consoles.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Allows for usage of the Pokémon GO Plus.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: In order to add Live Event calendar items.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Enabling this setting allows you to use AR when catching Pokémon.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Pokémon GO needs to access and upload your contacts to our servers to send game invites and friend requests to people in your address book.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Pokémon GO needs your activity data to hatch Pokémon eggs, help your Pokémon find candies, and display total distance walked.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Pokémon GO needs your activity data to hatch Pokémon eggs, help your Pokémon find candies, and display total distance walked.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Set your device’s location permissions to Always to collect Candy, hatch Eggs, and earn rewards—even when Pokémon GO isn’t open!
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Set your device’s location permissions to Always to collect Candy, hatch Eggs, and earn rewards—even when Pokémon GO isn’t open!
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Pokémon GO requires your mobile device’s location permissions to be enabled in order to find Pokémon and PokéStops near you.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: Pokémon GO requires your mobile device’s motion permissions to be enabled in order to let you know when new Pokémon are nearby.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: In order to save pictures of encountered Pokémon.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: In order to save pictures of encountered Pokémon.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: If you enable this setting, your information can be used to deliver personalized ads to you regarding Pokémon GO exclusive offers, promotions, and events.

news.title: Update v0.335.1-0.416 is out now
news.caption:
- Fixed Avatar in Low Power Mode.
- Fixed False Rocket Limit Warning.
